card.name: Chandra, Torch of Defiance
card.text: +1: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 2 damage to each opponent. +1: Add 2 Red mana to your mana pool. −3: Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Soul-Scar Mage
card.text: Prowess. If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to a creature an opponent controls, put that many -1/-1 counters on that creature instead.

card.name: Bomat Courier
card.text: Haste. Whenever Bomat Courier attacks, exile the top card of your library face down. (You can't look at it.) Red, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Bomat Courier: Put all cards exiled with Bomat Courier into their owners' hands.

card.name: Earthshaker Khenra
card.text: Haste. When Earthshaker Khenra enters the battlefield, target creature with power less than or equal to Earthshaker Khenra's power can't block this turn. Eternalize 4RedRed (4RedRed, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Jackal Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ahn-Crop Crasher
card.text: Haste. You may exert Ahn-Crop Crasher as it attacks. When you do, target creature can't block this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.). "Hesitation breeds dissension. To be worthy of the next life, you must never look back." —Anep, vizier of Hazoret

card.name: Scavenger Grounds
card.text: Tap: Add Colorless to your mana pool. 2, Tap, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all cards from all graveyards. When the last scrap of flesh is scoured away, the Curse of Wandering ends. Then the dead may sleep.
